title: A1534 820-00687-b
message:
cliente working with laptop and turn off, never again turn on...

i have check with other flex usb-c ..dont work

PPBUS_G3H = 0v
PPBUS_S5_HS_COMPUTING_ISNS = 0V
PPVBUS_LIO = 5,2V
PP3V3R3V0_AON = 2,98V
PPVRTC_G3H = 0V
PP5V_G3H = 0V
PP5V_S0 = 0V
PP3V3_S5 = 0V
PP3V3_S0 = 0V
PP3V3_SUS = 0V


any ideas? thanks

title: A1534 820-00687-b
message:
"PP3V3R3V0_AON = 2,98V"
You may have problems with U/C3100, or even U7000.
U3100 is the first suspect.
However, start removing C3100.

BTW, U3100 delivers any LDO?

title: A1534 820-00687-b
message:
C3100 don't short and value 744 (other board 820-00244 C3100 value 1389)

remove C3100 LDO all 0v but now I don't have 5,2v in F3050...(strange)

do u want me to try a reballing of U3100? or replacement for another board?

thx

title: A1534 820-00687-b
message:
Replace, not reball.

BTW, still not checking diode mode in correct way, after many years on the forum?

title: A1534 820-00687-b
message: solved !!! very very thanks !!! u r the best ! thanks friend
